actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Lugar with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 398.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the restoration of democracy in the Philippines.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress: (1) notes the pledge of President Marcos for free and fair elections in the Philippines; and (2) believes that in order to provide for an honest election that will be deemed credible to the Philippine people, it is important that they determine the timing of such election in accordance with the Philippine Constitution, appoint an impartial Commission on Elections, and provide accreditation of the election, access to the media for both sides, and neutral conduct by the Philippine military.

titles.title: An original concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the restoration of democracy in the Philippines.
